price: I faraonu čarobnjaci dođoše. "Da li ćemo, doista, nagradu dobiti ako budemo pobjednici?", upitaše.
arabic: وَجَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wajāa al-saḥaratu fir'ʿawna qālū inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnu al-ghālibīna
